name: The MatchMaker - Love & Roguelite
description:
The MatchMaker - Love & Roguelite is a unique combination of matchmaking sim & roguelike game. Play as the matchmaker & help procedurally generated clients find their true love.

The game is made for Gamejam+ 2020

Pitch Video: https://youtu.be/38KjEOc4UMg

Theme: Connection

Main Platform: PC
with potential expansion to Consoles and Mobiles

Developed by:

Nikko - Game Designer
Royce - Programmer
Amelia - 2D Artist
Patrick -- Composer

We would love to continue the development of the game and release it as full game.
Please support us by playing and leaving comments.

Thank you
